name: The Ancestor
summary:
“The Ancestor” is a visually stunning video about one man’s journey from death into the afterlife and beyond, created by Pixar's Timothy Hahn and Brooklyn-based director Keith Boynton. VFS Sound Design grad Paola Cordova Casilas has only made this video more powerful with her original soundscape. Let us know what you think about it in comments!
"The Ancestor" official music video: https://youtu.be/kg_EYc3SFuQ
Originally produced for Darlingside www.darlingside.com
Director/Writer: Keith Boynton www.CrazyLakePictures.com
Producer/Writer: Mike Lavoie www.Lavoie.nyc
Producer/Editor: Timothy Hahn 
Lead animator: Abraham Dieckman www.skylightcity.com
Lead artist: Pamela Goodman www.pamelagoodman.com
info:
• 中文名: 起源
  • 上映年度: 2019
  • 片长: 3:32
